Title: NTILE()
Description: NTILE(n) 函数将窗口划分为 n 个分组，并返回各行的分组编号。

WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT
        1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+1
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
    n<10
)
SELECT
    n,
    NTILE(5) OVER (),
    NTILE(2) OVER ()
FROM
    cte;
Examples:
WITH RECURSIVE cte(n) AS (
    SELECT
        1
    UNION
    SELECT
        n+1
    FROM
        cte
    WHERE
    n<10
)
SELECT
    n,
    NTILE(5) OVER (),
    NTILE(2) OVER ()
FROM
    cte;
